Storm's Rebuke.name: Storm's Rebuke
Storm's Rebuke.flavor: You spread wings of lightning, knocking your foes away as you take to the air.
Storm's Rebuke.attack:
Wisdom + 4 vs. Reflex
Increase to Wisdom + 6 vs. Reflex at 21st level.
Storm's Rebuke.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning and thunder damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Dragon Storm.name: Dragon Storm
Dragon Storm.flavor: Your weapon is the thunder of the storm, and as you call upon it, clouds appear above you. Lightning strikes your foes, and the storm winds buffet enemies and allies alike, allowing you to position them as you please.
Dragon Storm.effect:
The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. An enemy that starts its turn in the zone takes 10 lightning damage. Whenever a creature starts its turn in the zone, you can slide the creature 1 square as an immediate interrupt.
As a move action, you can move the zone 3 squares.

Spirit Wings.name: Spirit Wings
Spirit Wings.flavor: Draconic wind spirits lift you and your allies to carry you through the air.
Spirit Wings.effect: Each ally within 10 squares of you can fly 10 squares as a free action. You fly 10 squares.
